title: Kled top build
body: Hi so i've been playing Kled {{champion:240}} in the top lave who is amazing and been trying some builds so I was wondering if anyone has came up with some cool builds for kled I've been using AD so let me know if anyone has tried AP and CDR and let me know what builds you guys have came up with

replies.body: Ghost blade and either of the hydra items work well on him for the auto attack resets, then I'd say go full tank coz he is an all in champion with little escape

Little escapes except for: _Low cooldowns on 2 potential dashes, slows, a selfknockback, untargetability (that also breaks CC), very high base movement speed, and a charge that can be used the same as Sion's to escape._

It could just be me, but that sounds like a hell of a lot more escapes than a lot of other champs.

He only gets his second dash if he goes through a champion or epic monster and even then you can only dash towards that champion/ monster his movement speed is severely cut when not moving towards an enemy champion and his ult automatically targets the closest champion and quite easily stopped and when he drops mount his movement speed is then cut again, he is not made to get out of team fights once he has engaged

His dash is similar to renekton's you can still use the first one to get out of situations easy as. Or you can dash into them, and juke them by dashing out again the way you came.

He isn't trapped in a fight once he goes in.

He has more escapes than someone like Shen, but you still see Shens getting out of fights.

I've tried a few different Kled builds and I always manage to go 40% CDR in every build (even when I went Crit Strike I built a Death's Dance and Essence Reaver)
Some good ones:
-Titanic Hydra into full tank
-AD bruiser
-Critical Strike
-Full AD Assassin (Duskblade, Ravenous, Youmuu's, etc)

My personal favourite AD Bruiser build:
Black Cleaver -> Death's Dance -> Boots of Swiftness -> Sterak's Gage (If the enemy team is AP heavy go Maw instead) -> Guardian Angel -> Deadman's Plate (Note: I run 10% CDR in Runes but you can try working in Lucidity boots, or Spirit Visage/Youmuu's for the last 10%)

Now Death's Dance, Boots and the last item are all up to you. 
Ravenous is probably better than DD, I just love the CDR and survivability - Kled can rock any shoes except Sorcerer's and there's a heap of last item options, DMP was just one suggestion. Mess around however you like with that last one. Frozen Mallet is probably a good option, haven't tried it yet tho!

Black Cleaver though is almost always first buy. AD, CDR, Armour Shred, HP and movespeed. Everything Kled wants in one item.
Sterak's Gage/Maw + Guardian Angel are also **INCREDIBLE** items on him and I recommend squeezing them into his build wherever you can. They give you plenty of opportunity to get Skaarl back after you've been dismounted and makes you insanely hard to kill. I've won a lot of fights because of them :')
